      <description><![CDATA[Angel One reported a net profit of ₹268.6 crore for Q3FY26, down 4.5% year-on-year, while revenue rose 5.8% YoY to ₹1,334.8 crore.       <description><![CDATA[Lemon Tree Hotels will split its subsidiary Fleur Hotels into a separately listed company and bring in Warburg Pincus as a strategic investor.       <description><![CDATA[Executives from TeamLease Services and Info Edge said India’s new labour codes will increase PF and ESI contributions due to a standardised wage definition, raising compliance costs for companies. However, TeamLease said the impact can be absorbed within one annual increment cycle. Info Edge cautioned that higher hiring costs may pressure corporate margins. For gig and quick commerce firms, the shift may largely replace private insurance spending with government social security contributions, limiting the overall cost increase.]]></description>
